title: [ui] ui/asm/sym.rs test fails with 'assertion failed: `(left == right)

labels.name: A-testsuite
labels.description: Area: The testsuite used to check the correctness of rustc

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
Hello,

I've stumbled upon this single test failure while packaging 1.54.0 for GNU Guix.

I tried this command:

```sh
"./x.py" "-j24" "test" "-vv"
```

I expected to see this happen: all test passes

Instead, this happened: one test failed (see below)

### Meta

version: 1.54.0 (release)

```
................................................................................
```
